full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GRUB RGYAL LUGS KYI TSE DBANG ZAB MO RANG GIS LEN TSUL RIG 'DZIN DBANG MO'I ZHAL LUNG GA-YUNG DRUNG SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @020A *, ,(DE LTAR GRUB RGYAL LUGS KYI TSE DBANG BSKUR TSUL RAMG PHYOGS SU RGYAL BA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO DANG, PAn CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA GNYIS KA TSAD MA'I SKYES MCHOG DAM PA'I GSUNG YIN KYANG, SNGA MAR SKU GSUNG THUGS KYI RJES GNANG GI SGO NAS TSE @020B BSRINGS TSUL MI GSAL BA PHYI MAR GSAL BAR GSUNGS PA DANG, PAn CHEN NYID RGYAL BA TSE DPAG MED KYI RNAM 'PHRUL YIN PA BCAS, 'DIR PAn CHEN GYI GSUNG NYID RANG LA 'DON PA SBOS PA MA TOGS SGRA JI BZHIN PAR BKOD LA, DER BDAG BSKYED BSGOM TSUL DANG TSE RIL BYIN RLABS KYI NGAG 'DON ZHAL MI GSAL BA RJE BTZUN YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I TSE DBANG BSKUR TSUL GYI YIG CHA NYID PAn CHEN GYI GSUNG LA GZHI MDZAD 'DUG PAS DE LAS BLANGS, TSE CHANG DANG TSE RIL SBYIN PA'I TSIG GZHUNG DU MI GSAL BA RJE 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I GSUNG JI LTA BAR BKOD PA YIN NO, ,PADMA 'DAB BZHI 'AM TSOM BU BKOD PA'I STENG DU DBUS SU CHANG DANG BU RAM MAR SOGS SBYAR BA'I TSE BUM DMAR PO MAR GYIS SPRAS PA BYAS PAR RJE 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PAS GSUNGS,, ,,)
